title: My Little Universe
description:
The universe is vast and filled with adventures, mysteries to solve, and enemies to fight who knows, you might even meet a few friendly faces along the way. Better yet, invite up to three of your friends to join you in the split-screen local co-op mode because itâ€™s always more exciting with friends 9 mythical worlds and 65+ different dungeons, from mythology-inspired lands to hostile alien worlds await you and your friends.
Filled with wonder and plunder , challenges and adversaries, your task is to restore these beautiful worlds to their former glory. The worlds are filled with rich minerals ready to be harvested by your trusty tools , and mythical artifacts of untapped power guarded by powerful foes. Use more than 70 different gatherable resources to recreate lands long lost to a mysterious threat. SWORD ART ONLINE Last Recollection
